duties_responsibilities.duty: Operate concrete cutting and breaking equipment for the replacement of city streets, curb & gutter, and sidewalks.
Lead various concrete-related projects including removal and installation of sidewalk, curbing, gutter, signage, and stormwater systems.
Oversee and participate in the removal of snow during the winter months including plowing and hauling of snow from City streets, sidewalks, trails, and parking lots.
Assist in storm control activities such as placing sandbags, barricades, and picking up litter or debris.
Operate a variety of specialized equipment such as front-end loader, trucks, de-icing, snow hauling, plowing, and sweeping streets.
Utilize IT equipment to enter, retrieve, review, or modify data; verify accuracy of entered data and make corrections.

education_certification.credential: DOT physical card, Class B Commercial Driver’s License with Air Brake and potentially Tanker endorsement
